name: Fight Masters Kung Fu
description:
Fight Masters version Kung Fu is a Beat 'em up retro 2D.

Fight with Chamomile, Poleo and Steven Norris to save Shorts City from Tripiman's evil minions.

Gang members, killer ninjas, witches, zombies, punches, flying kick and an exciting plot!

Enjoy stunning graphics in this free game totally inspired by the 80s.

3 different characters and endings!

20 levels

Difficulty: normal / difficult

Subtitles: English / Spanish
Voices: Spanish
